title: Scott Hahn - Catholic Biblical Scholar, Apologist - 18 books
description:
18 books by Scott Hahn; all are epub and mobi formats except Covenant and Communion, which is pdf format

Scott Hahn is a professor of theology at Franciscan University of Steubenville and a well-known biblical scholar and apologist. He first became famous delivering lectures on biblical scholarship (usually with a strong focus on the theme of "kinship covenant") and telling the story of his conversion to Catholicism from evangelical Protestantism.

Hahn's theology and apologetics are extremely conservative; he is a member of Opus Dei.

Books in this torrent include:

Answering the New Atheism: Dismantling Dawkins' Case Against God (with Benjamin Wiker)
Catholic Bible Dictionary
Consuming the Word: The New Testament and the Eucharist in the Early Church
Covenant and Communion: The Biblical Theology of Pope Benedict XVI
A Father Who Keeps His Promise: God's Covenant Love in Scripture
First Comes Love: The Family in the Church and the Trinity
Hail, Holy Queen: The Mother of God in the Word of God
The Lamb's Supper: The Mass as Heaven on Earth
Letter and Spirit: From Written Text to Living Word in the Liturgy
Lord, Have Mercy: The Healing Power of Confession
Ordinary Work, Extraordinary Grace: My Spiritual Journey in Opus Dei
A Pocket Guide to the Bible
Reasons to Believe: How to Understand, Explain, and Defend the Catholic Faith
Rome Sweet Home: Our Journey to Catholicism (with Kimberly Hahn)
Scripture Matters: Essays on Reading the Bible From the Heart of the Church
Signs of Life: 40 Catholic Customs and Their Biblical Roots
Swear to God: The Promise and Power of the Sacraments
Understanding Our Father: Biblical Reflections on the Lord's Prayer
